Components.Concrete.Parser

Interface IParserComp

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPAMOJAComponent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IDeterministicParserComp, IParserCompExt, ISLRParserComp
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CDeterministicParserComp, CInterpretingParserComp, CLimBacktrackerParserComp, CLRParserComp, CParserComp, CParserCompExt, CSLRParserComp, CSourceCodeDeterministicParserComp, CSourceCodeGeneratedParserComp

    public interface IParserComp
extends IPAMOJAComponent
    Defines services for interacting with other components ( like, Grammar and SymbolStream components).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IGrammarComp getGrammar()
      Get the grammar object.
      CParser getParser()
      Returns a parser object.
      CParserResult getParserResult()
      Returns a parser-result object containing boolean value (indicating whether a parse was successful or not) and the parse tree constructed.
      ISymbolStreamComp getSymbolStream()
      Get the symbolstream object.
      void setGrammar(IGrammarComp aGrammar)
      Links to GrammarComp component via its interface.
      void setParser(CParser parser)
      Sets the specified parser object to this parser component.
      void setSymbolStream(ISymbolStreamComp aSymbolStream)
      Links to SymbolStreamComp component via its interface.

      • Methods inherited from interface Components.IPAMOJAComponent

        addPropertyChangeListener, removePropertyChangeListener

    • Method Detail

      • getParser

        CParser getParser()
        Returns a parser object. This an abstract method to be implemented by the descendants.
        Returns:
        the parser object.

      • setParser

        void setParser(CParser parser)
        Sets the specified parser object to this parser component. This an abstract method to be implemented by the descendants.
        Parameters:
        parser - @author Jackline Ssanyu (jssanyu@kyu.ac.ug)

      • getParserResult

        CParserResult getParserResult()
        Returns a parser-result object containing boolean value (indicating whether a parse was successful or not) and the parse tree constructed. This an abstract method to be implemented by the descendants.
        Returns:
        the value of the parser-result object.

      • setGrammar

        void setGrammar(IGrammarComp aGrammar)
        Links to GrammarComp component via its interface. Sets the value of Grammar and registers for property change events.
        Parameters:
        aGrammar - new value of Grammar

      • getGrammar

        IGrammarComp getGrammar()
        Get the grammar object.
        Returns:
